text.name: info1
text.text: Windows 3.0 was released by Microsoft in 1990 and

text.name: info2
text.text: featured a graphical user interface running on top of

text.name: info3
text.text: MS-DOS. It introduced advanced memory management

text.name: info4
text.text: and functionality like clickable icons. Later updates

text.name: info5
text.text: added multimedia support and the ability to access

text.name: info6
text.text: CD-ROMs for storage, among many other things.
